content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Temporary Storage Area at Position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden Chest at position (10.5, 10.5)

### Iron Plate Distribution System
Consists of:
- Burner Inserter at position (1.5, -0.5) with pickup position (1.5, 0.5) and drop position (1.5, -1.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (3.5, -0.5) with pickup position (3.5, 0.5) and drop position (3.5, -1.5)
- Transport Belt at position (3.5, 1.5) connecting the inserters
- Wooden Chest at position (6.5, 1.5) for storage

### Belt Network
Consists of multiple belt groups:
- BeltGroup connecting various positions, including:
  - (x=-3.5, y=-53.5) to (x=-5.5, y=-53.5)
  - (x=-15.5, y=-51.5) to (x=-15.5, y=-49.5)
  - (x=4.5, y=1.5) to (x=2.5, y=1.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied tiles
- Ensure that the target tile is clear of any existing objects before attempting to place a new entity. This will prevent placement errors due to occupied spaces.

### Inventory Management Errors
- Regularly check and manage your inventory to avoid it becoming full. A full inventory can prevent picking up items or harvesting resources, leading to operational delays.

### Errors when adjusting inserters
- Verify the presence of the target entity before attempting to adjust it. Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position to avoid errors related to non-existent entities.

### Errors when inserting items into the belt system
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the belt system. This will prevent errors related to missing items.
